channel.title: Did your dad Or mum,Or sister Lock your computer: TAKE A LOOK HERE
channel.description:
[u]Step 1[/u] Very simple to bypass the Password Reboot your pc and repeatly press F8 untill system reboot manager has come up scan through and start in Safe mode.
[u]LAST STEP[/u] Now it will take a while to load loads of codes soon after it will go to the password bit there will be a bit called Admin Select that then go to Start>Control Panel>User Accounts>Then edit or create Your own account with password if you like then Reboot you computer once more and then select your account And walla Your an admin!
It works i have tried it.. give it a try now

make a new admin, log on the new admin acc make your acc admin logg out, log in on yours, and delete the acc you just made
